response.original_title: 実録!!ほんとにあった恐怖の投稿映像 ～心霊啓示録～
response.overview: The series has been collabolated with various genres such as TV personalities, magazines, and news sites, and has over 80 titles in total! In this work, the ghosts that appear in the film appeal to the viewer! In other words, the film focuses on images of earthbound spirits or ghosts that appear to be earthbound spirits. These images are indiscriminately reflected from gaps in private lives and memories, etc. Is this a coincidence? Or is it an artifact of the spirit? We would like to show you.
response.title: Actual Record! Real Horror Posted Video: Supernatural Revelation
